text: Seeberg is a municipality of the administrative district of Oberaargau in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. The lake Burgäschisee is on the border with Aeschi. On 1 January 2016, the former municipality of Hermiswil merged into Seeberg.Nomenklaturen – Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 3 February 2016 == References == == Other websites == * Official website of Seeberg Category:Municipalities in Oberaargau
title: Seeberg
